title: Associate Data Analyst
intro: Begin your journey in data analytics by learning the fundamental skills needed to collect, analyze, and interpret data to support business decisions.
ifYouLike: working with data, generating reports, and discovering patterns

title: Data Analyst with Python & SQL
intro: Gain advanced knowledge to work with real-world datasets, analyze trends, and improve business insights using a variety of analytical techniques.
ifYouLike: analyzing data, building visualizations, and solving business problems through data insights

title: Machine Learning Engineer
intro: Master the core concepts and advanced techniques of machine learning, enabling you to build scalable models and contribute to AI projects.
ifYouLike: working on machine learning algorithms, developing AI systems, and solving complex data challenges

title: Data Scientist with LLM
intro: Become a leader in artificial intelligence by mastering machine learning, deep learning, and large language models (LLMs) to build cutting-edge AI solutions.
ifYouLike: working with AI systems, creating machine learning models, and developing full-stack AI solutions

title: Software Engineer I
intro: Build a solid foundation in software engineering by mastering Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) along with System Design principles.
ifYouLike: solving coding challenges, designing scalable systems, and optimizing algorithms

title: Data Engineer
intro: Learn how to design and implement the architecture that allows data generation, transformation, and analysis at scale in modern businesses.
ifYouLike: building data pipelines, working with large datasets, and optimizing data systems
